title: League Desktop Icon
body: This is by no means a big issue.  That being said, I have had to reinstall league and since then the desktop icon and task bar icon is the old league icon.  Rather than being the updated client icon.  Just curious what could be done to change this?  Any insight is appreciated.  Thanks!

replies.body:
Go to where you installed League (default is C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and right click on this icon and click create a shortcut. That should get you going again ^_^

https://i.gyazo.com/270bd3c847f217bfc856af6b9f632c16.png

Have the same 'problem' since I reinstalled the game due to this common "fake-FPS-drop-bug" (which I created a post for). Somehow the new alpha client isn't even linked on my desktop and it starts the old client which tells me to open the new client xD
